item.title: Report X-2025041123
item.description:
Report X-2025041123

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-18T21:15:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-16
  • City: ROSEVILLE
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 4/16/2025 at approximately 1745, Dangerous Goods Administration received a call from Employee 832024 at the station location in Roseville, reporting undeclared dangerous goods. The shipment consisted of one fiberboard box that contained two stuffed teddy bears and other Easter-themed decorations. The shipment was discovered by the K-9 unit during the location's screening procedure. Further investigation resulted in the discovery of a disassembled AR-15 rifle and a loaded magazine cartridge that was found inside one of the teddy bears. The shipment was not prepared in accordance with IATA Regulations, missing the required markings, labeling, packaging, and paperwork. The shipment is being held, pending an investigation by the FAA.
